TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|Numerical ID to identify the organization within this application

TableField.name: ParentOrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Parent Organization|The next higher level of an organization on a heirachy

ForeignField.name: ParentOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Parent Organization|The next higher level of an organization on a heirachy

TableField.name: DirectionOrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Direction Organization|The organization providing direction to the organization. The organization selected will automatically filter module specific direction provided throughout the application

ForeignField.name: DirectionOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Direction Organization|The organization providing direction to the organization. The organization selected will automatically filter module specific direction provided throughout the application

TableField.name: PolicyOrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Policy Organization|The organization responsible for issuing policy expectations to the organization. The organization selected will automatically populate the Policy Organization field within modules which rely on the sharing of policy expectations

ForeignField.name: PolicyOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Organization|The organization responsible for issuing policy expectations to the organization. The organization selected will automatically populate the Policy Organization field within modules which rely on the sharing of policy expectations

TableField.name: Name
TableField.phrase: Name|Name used to identify the organization

TableField.name: ShortName
TableField.phrase: Short Name|A short name used to identify the organization

TableField.name: Description
TableField.phrase: Description|Text description of the organization
TableField.sample: Software Development company and risk services provider

TableField.name: IndustryCodeID
TableField.phrase: Industry Code|Numerical code used to identify the organization's industrial classification. If multiple codes apply, choose the most relevent one.

ForeignField.name: IndustryCode
ForeignField.phrase: Industry Code|Numerical code used to identify the organization's industrial classification. If multiple codes apply, choose the most relevant one.

ForeignField.name: IndustryDescription
ForeignField.phrase: Industry Description|Describes the applicable industry code.

ForeignField.name: IndustryGroupID
ForeignField.phrase: Industry Group|Third level of a hirearchy to identify the organization's industrial classification.

ForeignField.name: IndustryGroup
ForeignField.phrase: Industry Group|Third level of a hirearchy to identify the organization's industrial classification.

ForeignField.name: IndustrySubSectorID
ForeignField.phrase: Industry Subsector|Second level of a hirearchy to identify the organization's industrial classification.

ForeignField.name: IndustrySubSector
ForeignField.phrase: Industry Subsector|Second level of a hirearchy to identify the organization's industrial classification.

ForeignField.name: IndustrySectorID
ForeignField.phrase: Industry Sector|First level of a hirearchy to identify the organization's industrial classification.

ForeignField.name: IndustrySector
ForeignField.phrase: Industry Sector|First level of a hirearchy to identify the organization's industrial classification.

TableField.name: SIC
TableField.phrase: S.I.C.|The Standard Industry Classification assigned to the organization by the US Census Bureau

TableField.name: OrganizationTypeID
TableField.phrase: Organization Type|A combined field used to describe this organization type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: OrganizationCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Organization Category|A short term used to identify organizations with similar characteristics

CodeField.name: OrganizationCategory
CodeField.phrase: Organization Category|A short term used to identify organizations with similar characteristics

ForeignField.name: OrganizationTypeTitle
ForeignField.phrase: Title|A short title or phrase used to describe the type of organization

ForeignField.name: OrganizationTypeDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Organization Type|A detailed description of the organization type
ForeignField.sample: An facility designed to produce and ship ice cream products

ForeignField.name: OrganizationType
ForeignField.phrase: Organization Type|A detailed description of the organization type

TableField.name: URL
TableField.phrase: URL|Uniform resource locator of the organization which is usually the organization's home page

TableField.name: GuidanceLogoName
TableField.phrase: Guidance Logo Filename|The name of an image file used in the Guidance feature. This field only needs to be filled in if this organization provides guidance through the Guidance feature.

CalculatedField.name: GuidanceLogoNameIfNull
CalculatedField.phrase: Guidance Logo Filename (IfNulled)|The name of an image file used in the Guidance feature. This field only needs to be filled in if this organization provides guidance through the Guidance feature. This field substitutes a generic field name if none exists in the record.

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual with organizational oversight responisibilites. This is the highest ranking person at the local organization

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual with organizational oversight responisibilites. This is the highest ranking person at the local organization

RemoteField.name: PrimaryContactPersonID
RemoteField.phrase: Primary Contact Person|The person acting as the primary contact for the organization

ForeignField.name: PrimaryContactPerson
ForeignField.phrase: Primary Contact Person|The person acting as the primary contact for the organization

TableField.name: Address1
TableField.phrase: Address|Physical street address of the organization

ForeignField.name: CountryID
ForeignField.phrase: Country|The internationally recognized name of the country

ForeignField.name: Country
ForeignField.phrase: Country|A combined field used to associate this country with another record

ForeignField.name: StateID
ForeignField.phrase: State|A combined field used to associate this state with another record

ForeignField.name: State
ForeignField.phrase: State|A combined field used to associate this state with another record

ForeignField.name: StateAbbreviation
ForeignField.phrase: State|A combined field used to associate this state with another record

ForeignField.name: County
ForeignField.phrase: County|A combined field used to associate this county with another record

TableField.name: CountyID
TableField.phrase: County|A combined field used to associate this county with another record

TableField.name: City
TableField.phrase: City|The name of the city where this organization is located

TableField.name: PostalCode
TableField.phrase: Postal Code|Numerical postal code used to direct physical mail

TableField.name: Phone
TableField.phrase: Phone|Main telephone number of the organization

TableField.name: Fax
TableField.phrase: Fax|Main fax telephone number of the organization

TableField.name: Email
TableField.phrase: Email|Main organizational Email address used by the organization to correspond with those outside the organization

TableField.name: RegionID
TableField.phrase: Region|The geographical region this organization belongs to. (Regions are defined in the topmost parent organization.)

ForeignField.name: Region
ForeignField.phrase: Region|The geographical region this organization belongs to. (Regions are defined in the topmost parent organization.)

TableField.name: DivisionID
TableField.phrase: Division|The functional division this organization belongs to. (Divisions are defined in the topmost parent organization.)

ForeignField.name: Division
ForeignField.phrase: Division|The functional division this organization belongs to. (Divisions are defined in the topmost parent organization.)

TableField.name: Participant
TableField.phrase: Participant|Whether this organization is a participant in this installation of Active Agenda. If this box is checked, the organization will be available within all drop down lists where the organization field listType='allParticipants'. Users of the application can add organizations to the lists by checking this box but listTypes can only be modified from within the specification file for the application prior to the application being parsed. In other words, listTypes are determined by programmers while the list of participants is controlled by this field, by application users

TableField.name: Manufacturer
TableField.phrase: Manufacturer|Check this box if this organization is categorized as a manufacturer. Identifying this organization as a manufacturer will result in the organization being listed in list boxes throughout this software application

TableField.name: Contractor
TableField.phrase: Contractor|Check this box if this organization is categorized as a Contractor. Identifying this organization as a contractor will result in the organization being listed in list boxes throughout this software application

TableField.name: InsuranceCarrier
TableField.phrase: Insurance Carrier|Check this box if this organization is categorized as a insurance carrier. Identifying this organization as an insurance carrier will result in the organization being listed in list boxes throughout this software application

TableField.name: InsuranceBroker
TableField.phrase: Insurance Broker|Check this box if this organization is categorized as a insurance broker. Identifying this organization as an insurance broker will result in the organization being listed in list boxes throughout this software application

TableField.name: LawFirm
TableField.phrase: Law Firm|Check this box if this organization is categorized as a law firm. Identifying this organization as a law firm will result in the organization being listed in list boxes throughout this software application

TableField.name: GovAgency
TableField.phrase: Government Agency|Check this box if this organization is a government agency. Identifying this organization as a government agency will result in the organization being listed in list boxes throughout this software application

TableField.name: Public
TableField.phrase: Public Group|Check this box if this organization is a grouping of private citizens. Identifying this organization as a public group will result in the organization being listed in list boxes within the loss modules

TableField.name: Customer
TableField.phrase: Customer|Check this box if this organization is a customer of the company. Identifying this organization as a customer will result in the organization being listed in list boxes within the loss modules

TableField.name: AgencyLevelID
TableField.phrase: Agency Level|The heirarchial level of the agency from an international perspective

CodeField.name: AgencyLevel
CodeField.phrase: Agency Level|The heirarchial level of the agency from an international perspective

SummaryField.name: TotalEstExp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Exposure|The total estimated cost exposure associated with the organization

SummaryField.name: TotalEstOpp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Opportunity|The total estimated financial opportunity associated with the organization

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: Address
CombinedField.phrase: Address|A combined field used to describe the organization address when associating it with other records

CombinedField.name: GuidanceLogoImage
CombinedField.phrase: Guidance Logo Image|Displays a mini-logo that is intended for display with the Guidance feature

CombinedField.name: Organization
CombinedField.phrase: Organization|A combined field used to describe this organization when associating it with other records

EditScreen.phrase: Agreements|Associate business agreements and/or contracts with the organization

EditScreen.phrase: Continuity|Associate business continuation requirements with the organization

EditScreen.phrase: Exposures|Associate cost exposures with the organization

EditScreen.name: OperatingPermits
EditScreen.phrase: Permits|Associate operating permits with the organization

EditScreen.name: Opportunities
EditScreen.phrase: Opportunities|Associate financial opportunities with the organization

EditScreen.name: Suppliers
EditScreen.phrase: Suppliers|Associate suppliers with the organization

EditScreen.name: Accountability
EditScreen.phrase: Accountability|Associate participants with ongoing accountabilities for the organization

EditScreen.name: Involvement
EditScreen.phrase: Involvement|Associate participants involved with the organization

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
